item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Adam Lindsay Gordon
item.description: "Life is mostly froth and bubble, Two things stand like stone. Kindness in another's trouble, Courage in your own." -- Adam Lindsay Gordon

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "I AM IGNORANT of absolute truth. But I am humble before my ignorance and therein lies my honor and my reward." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life always waits for some crisis to occur before revealing itself at its most brilliant." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Alexandra Fuller
item.description: "What is important is the story. Because when we are all dust and teeth and kicked-up bits of skin - when we're dancing with our own skeletons - our words might be all that's left of us." -- Alexandra Fuller

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Brian Weiss
item.description: "More learning can occur when there are many obstacles then when thear are few or none. A life with difficult relationships, filled with obstacles and losses, presents the most opportunity for the soul's growth. You may have chosen the more difficult life so that you could accelerate your physical progress" -- Brian Weiss

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Brian Weiss MD
item.description: "Life is holy, there is no reason ever to kill" -- Brian Weiss MD

item.title: Shakirah add a quote by Rummi
item.description: "Don't grieve for what doesn't come. Some things that don't happen keep disasters from happening" -- Rummi
